item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description: Hello World! Nice to see you here. So you probably want to know a little bit about what content i will be posting on this blog, right? For the most part i will blog about what i am currently learning, what projects i already did and sometimes a tutorial on topics that i am already quite familiar. If that sparked your interest than you can add my blog to your rss reader and never miss a post.
